item.title: A Dive into the Kruskal-Wallis Test and its R Code
item.description: This is a post about statistical computing. In this post, I would like to talk about the following things: introduce the Kruscal_Wallis test examine how to implement this code in R (stats::kruskal.test, coin::oneway_test, rstatix::kruskal_test is not written in R) examine how to improve the performance of the R code Introduction Let the data consist of \(N = \sum_{j=1}^{k}n_{j}\) observations from the jth treatmentm j = 1,2,â€¦k.
